Params: {3: "They must have spotted you somewhere along the way. That's why they're chasing you..."}
{3: 'Before you know it, you find yourself near the ruins of a farm.'}
{3: "You wonder why it's awfully quiet here..."}
{3: 'Lee picks up a tattered piece of fabric from the ground. It looks like it came from a part of a backpack.'}
{3: "It's the logo of the... expedition the mayor spoke of."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The Corrupted drove us here on purpose.', 4: '3'}
{3: "There's the sound of mechanical feet rustling grass from somewhere nearby."}
{3: 'You suddenly understand why the expedition went missing.'}
